redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.intro: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your basket as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Basket' link to view the contents of your shopping basket.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.intro: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.

search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

order_confirmation.order_pending_review_text: Your order was sent to us but is currently awaiting payment. Once we receive the payment for your order, it will be completed. If you've already provided payment details then we will process your order manually and send you an email when it's completed.
order_confirmation.order_pending_status_text: We've received your order and are processing your payment. Once the payment is verified, your order will be completed. We will send you an email when it's completed. Please note, this process may take a few minutes depending on the processing times of your chosen method. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_incomplete_status_text: We've received your order and payment. Your order is now being processed by our system. Please note, processing may take a few minutes. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_with_downloadable_digital_items_te: If you have any problems or questions about your purchase, please contact our Customer Care team via the form on the Contact Us page.
order_confirmation.order_with_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, please contact our Customer Care team via the form on the Contact Us page or call us at {supportPhoneNumber}.
order_confirmation.order_without_downloadable_digital_items: Once we receive your payment, we’ll send a confirmation email with a link to download your digital purchases.
order_confirmation.order_without_support_number_text:
What happens next?
In a few seconds you will receive an email confirmation. If you do not receive this, check your inbox is not full and that you have not made a mistake when entering your email address as it is likely to mean your purchase will also not be received. If you have made a mistake, update it in your profile and inform the Customer Care team so they can resend your digital content.

Order completed:
Your order is currently in 'Awaiting payment' status, although your bank has authorized your payment it remains in this status until the transfer of funds has completed and your order has been reviewed. This usually happens within a few minutes but on occasion it may take longer. When this has completed you will receive an order update notification confirming your order is now completed.

Content delivery:
Your order completing will trigger your digital content to be generated and a separate email for each product will be sent to your inbox. You should normally receive your content within 5 minutes but sometimes it could take a little longer. If you do not receive your content within 15 minutes check that the emails are not in your junk/spam folder which can happen on occasion especially if you do not usually receive emails relating to gaming.
order_confirmation.order_status_update_facebook_messenger_h: Get instant updates of your order to Messenger
